${siteName} © is a subsidiary of NUROX Ltd © (learn more)
${siteName} is basically a free Information Service for buyers and sellers. We provide information on the best prices and quality for various goods and services.
We provide market information (free of charge)
We provide quick, easy and safe connections between buyers and sellers through our email, comments, chat and other services.
We are not one shop, but the voice of many
${siteName} is a free portal for sellers
Items on ${siteName} are uploaded by various producers, wholesalers, agents, individuals etc
We currently operate a Free Delivery Service within Abuja town for items worth more than NGN 10,000.
Buyers may also wish to pick up their items from any of our point of contacts
Buyers are informed of the nearest point of contact after purchase
Buyers outside Abuja are required to pay for shipping from Abuja.
Buyers outside Abuja may also organize for collecting their items from any of our point of contacts.
Our service to buyers
We help buyers make sense of large amounts of information by provding a means of categorising, sorting and comparing information
We offer Buyer Protection - The seller gets paid only when you confirm you have recieved the product in satisfactory condition.
Our service to sellers
We help sellers reach a wide range of buyers by sending free emails to our registered users who have shown interest in the sellers product
We help sellers by providing periodic market insight for free
${siteName} is maintained by a community of developers dedicated to provding: Free, Safe, Easy to Use and Timely services.
Contact Us
